settings.answertext: All subscription orders qualify for 10% off. We do not have a minimum frequency or order size. (If you cancel before you’ve received three shipments, you will be charged the full purchase price for all items.)

settings.questiontext: Can I change the products or frequency before I’ve received my shipments?
settings.answertext: You can change your subscription as much as you wish. Sign into your account to make product or frequency changes.

settings.questiontext: Will I be charged a fee if I change my subscription before I’ve received my shipments?
settings.answertext: All subscription orders qualify for 10% off. We do not have a minimum frequency or order size. (If you cancel before you’ve received three shipments, you will be charged the full purchase price for all items.)

settings.questiontext: Is there a fee to sign up for a subscription?
settings.answertext: No, there are no sign up fees. The only charges you will receive are for the products themselves.
